title: Poland-Belarus border crisis deepens as migrants make hundreds of fresh attempts to breach fences
content:
1. Poland-Belarus border crisis deepens as migrants make hundreds of fresh attempts to breach fences  CNN
  2. Belarus migrants: Poland PM blames Russia's Putin for migrant crisis  BBC News
  3. Poland detains refugees, increases troops at Belarusian border  Al Jazeera English
  4. The Guardian view on Belarus and migrants: exploiting the vulnerable  The Guardian
  5. EU accuses Belarus leader of 'gangster-style approach' to migrants at border - BBC News  BBC News
